commit message: Add workgroup links, and agenda links for HTML agendas.
Added 28C3, and reverted an accidental commit to manifest.
Update version number. If I don't understand my own file formats...

Moving seed refresh stuff around a little bit. Now I have to make it
asynchronous.

Seed refresh is now asynchronous, but still a bit buggy. Need to add
force-refresh logic, also.
Fixed a bug that broke loading of the initial seed (at db creation time).

Different dpi versions of icon. Makes it look a bit better on my Galaxy
Nexus, at least.

Add next/prev day buttons that fade out after 2s. Now to make them reappear
when the user scrolls.

Stop whining about the async schedule load being a hack. I wrote it mostly
by copy-pasting stuff from somewhere but that's how all the kids do Android
development anyway apparently. That doesn't make it a hack.

Show the day buttons when the user scrolls. Untested because the
fasten-your-seatbelts light is currently on so I can't get my micro USB
cable. (-:

Indent fix. I absolutely detest how Eclipse and similar editors don't know
how to handle tabs.

Two bugfixes: Fetcher shouldn't send any progress info if we're still at
0% because the progress indicator code handles it stupidly, and null deref
fix in day switch buttons code.

Fixing *huge* performance regression in TimeTable view caused by
a recent Schedule.getTents() change. (Basically, just cache the list instead
of re-requesting it hundreds of time while scrolling.)

Fix crash bug on leaving ChooserActivity while a seed refresh is still in
progress.

0.9.9, released to fix the stupid progress indicator crash bug many people
were running into.
